arm_group.description: Image-guided needle procedures with XperGuide performed prior to this study within institution.
Image-guided needle procedures with XperGuide with virtual path planning

brief_summary.textblock:
Philips Healthcare has added a virtual path planner to the current commercially available
      XperGuide software platform and that has the potential to significantly reduce dose during
      image-guided needle interventions.

clinical_study.brief_title: Virtual Path Planning for Image-guided Needle Interventions

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigational device is used for image guidance by virtually planned path and X-ray
      data.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients at any age who are referred for a clinically indicated XperGuide
             interventional procedure.

          -  The informed consent has been signed by the participant, parent or legal guardian as
             appropriate.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -Pregnant patients.

study_pop.textblock: Patients of all ages. Patient weight is limited to the specification of the patient table.

intervention.description: Live 3D image needle guidance which overlays live fluoroscopy and 3D soft tissue imaging data from previous acquired CT, MR or XperCT.
Instrument guidance allowing certain tasks that would normally occur using continuous X-ray guidance to be performed with reduced dose for patient and staff.

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Adding Virtual Path Planning to the Philips FD20 XperGuide to Reduce Radiation Dose During Image-guided Needle Interventional Procedures.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the workflow, usability, and clinical impact of device by assessing clinical outcome and success of the procedures.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patients will be followed starting from the procedure until hospital discharge or until 2 weeks after date of procedure at the latest

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Measure radiation dose delivered to patient during needle interventional procedures and compare collected results with existing data from needle interventional procedures performed XperGuide alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patients will be followed starting from the procedure until hospital discharge or until 2 weeks after date of procedure at the latest

secondary_outcome.description: Measure radiation dose received by operator during needle interventional procedures and compare collected results with existing data from needle interventional procedures performed XperGuide alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patients will be followed starting from the procedure until hospital discharge or until 2 weeks after date of procedure at the latest

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
